name: Supercar Fighter Jet With A Machine Gun
name_original: Supercar Fighter Jet With A Machine Gun
description:
---

Supercar Fighter Jet With A Machine Gun is an arcade shooter where obstacles come at you to the beat, made by just one cool dude (Zachary Kadera) who does not care about the tips of your fingers. 

You, Whip, are a racecar driver in an airplane-racing world. In a feat of impressive ingenuity and unfathomable stupidity, you strap a fighter jet engine and a machine gun to your car. With your new ride constructed, and maybe not enough grey matter in your skull, you decide to enter the largest, most important airplane racing event of our generation...

---

CONTROLS:

Keyboard

WASD: Movement

Arrow Keys: Up = Shoot, Left/Right = Dash, Down = Slow

Escape: Quit To Main Menu / Quit The game

Controller

Analog Stick: Movement

Y: Shoot

X/B: Dash

A: Slow

Start: Quit To Main Menu / Quit The game

---

This game is a build made for the Wake Tech ECGC Game Showcase. 

If you'd like to keep up with this game's development or let me know that I should continue this game's development, follow me on Twitter!

https://twitter.com/KaderaZachary
